sample_docs: Based on our expertise and valuable partners X InfoTech Ltd. provides solutions in following areas: Security is a process, not an event. It is critical part of how you do business. Data security and information privacy challenges confront all enterprises. Organizations of all types must balance regulatory requirements with the challenge to integrate data security into systems, procedures and cultures. Security is a process, not an event. Based on our expertise and valuable partners X InfoTech Ltd. provides solutions in following areas: With our partner support we provide: innovative solutions for the access to buildings, rooms and premises - from the basic access control supported by staff supervision to single-file access to high security areas. World-wide equipment is successfully in operation in government buildings, airports, banks, power plants, stadiums and many other companies. innovative solutions for the access to buildings, premises - from the basic access control supported by staff supervision to single-file access to high security areas.

X Infotech is proud to announce that a project for Estonian Ministry of Interior IT and Development Centre is successfully completed. The project involved development of a mobile application which is an integral part of a wider Entry Exit System implementation in Estonia. Delivered mobile solution enables real-time image validation, supports face enrolment with quality conformant to Entry-Exit System quality requirements and real-time quality assessment. The application allows to capture images compliant with ICAO guidelines for travel document photographs. With its secure data exchange and server-side configuration management, this application is a convenient tool for law enforcement officers in the field. "We are proud of being trusted to participate in border control process modernization in Estonia,†said Einars Leps, X Infotech Regional Sales Executive. "Our mobile application provides a seamless solution for capturing face images and ensuring their quality and compliance with ICAO standards.†X Infotech is committed to delivering innovative IT solutions that meet the needs of its customers and contribute to the overall improvement of systems and processes they serve. The mobile application for border crossing and migration control institutions is a testimony to this commitment, and X Infotech looks forward to continue supporting Estonian Ministry of Interior IT and Development Centre in its efforts to modernize and improve border control. EU-wide Entry-Exit System implementation is an important step in strengthening and protecting external Schengen area borders and increasing the security of its citizens. By modernizing and improving border control quality and efficiency, the Entry-Exit System will provide significant benefits for both law enforcement officers and Schengen area citizens. X Infotech delivers a turnkey solution for eID and Ecowas cards in Sierra Leone in collaboration with CONSTRAT SYSTEMS LTD and NCRA. X Infotech has successfully implemented a turnkey solution for national and non-national eID and Ecowas card issuance in Sierra Leone. The project was implemented, meeting the latest security requirements and industry standards. The delivered solution consists of a range of modules and components, including X Infotech personalization system, document registry, a complete Public Key Infrastructure solutions suite, various supporting systems, and hardware. All the parts of the system have been fully integrated to ensure seamless and efficient operation. Within this project, several important objectives have been achieved which will significantly improve the process efficiency of Sierra Leone document issuance. Moreover, the delivered solution lays a solid foundation for the future development of the whole country. Implementation of this solution demonstrates X Infotech's commitment to delivering high-quality and innovative digital solutions to the people of Sierra Leone. It will help to streamline government processes, improve citizens' personal data accuracy and security, providing the population with a more efficient and secure way of accessing services. "We are proud to be part of this project and work with professional partners such as CONSTRAT SYSTEMS LTD in delivering the national and non-national eID and Ecowas cards in Sierra Leone," said Sergey Yeliseyev, Business Development Director for Government eID of X Infotech. "We look forward to continue our work in Sierra Leone with CONSTRAT SYSTEMS LTD and NCRA and will fully support the digitalization efforts of the government."
